page.title: 13CUSTOMS AND EVENTS:ST.WENN
page.content: Many customs have died out.In the early 1900's St.Wenn was famed for {Cornish Wrestlers.}For a brief period there was a football team and until about 1945 there was a Sports Day. Church festivals are traditionally observed as is Remembrance Sunday. In August the church holds a{gymkhana. In Rosenannon village (bordering the D block) the Sunday School anniversary is celebrated with a{sports,a band {and a flora dance}through the village. The Womens Institute hold a monthly meeting in St.Wenn W.I.Hall.The Parish Council meets every two months in the same hall to discuss environmental and community problems. Every July and September the farmers gather for the sheep dipping.This is social occasion as well as a necessary precaution against sheep scab.
